member.name: T:XMLSerializer.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:XMLSerializer.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:XMLSerializer.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:XMLSerializer.XMLSerializer.Deserialize(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Xml.Linq.XElement},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Deserializes selected properties of an object from XML.
member.param: The object to be updated with properties from the XML elements.
The list of XML elements to deserialize from.
member.remarks: Properties of type Boolean, String, Double, Single, Integer, Nullable(Of Double), Nullable(Of Single), Nullable(Of Integer), ArrayList, Font, Color, [Enum] are supported.

member.name: M:XMLSerializer.XMLSerializer.Serialize(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Serializes selected properties of an object to XML.
member.remarks: Properties of type String, Double, Single, Integer, Nullable(Of Double), Nullable(Of Single), Nullable(Of Integer), ArrayList, Font, Color, [Enum] are supported.
